data.system_settings: Macbook Pro 2015 Screen resolution: 15,4-inch (2880 x 1800), MacOS Sierra: Version 10.13
data.actual_result: The text bugs out and doesn't know where to go
data.expected_result: Nothing happens / the scroll up cancels
data.short_description: Clicking on the "new messages bar" and scrolling down at the same time makes the text clip trough itself
data.steps_to_repro: - Go in a channel that has the "New messages bar" - Click it - immediately scroll down - See the text bug out
